TrainingModule.title: TrainingModule
TrainingModule.description: Represents a training module offered by DhaniHya Solutions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the training module.

title.description: The title of the training module.

description.description: A description of what the training module entails.

startDate.description: The start date of the training module.

endDate.description: The end date of the training module.

capacity.description: The maximum number of participants allowed in the training module.

Applicant.title: Applicant
Applicant.description: Represents an individual who has applied for a training module.

firstName.description: The first name of the applicant.

lastName.description: The last name of the applicant.

email.description: The email address of the applicant.

phone.description: The phone number of the applicant.

applicationDate.description: The date when the application was submitted.

/trainingModules/{trainingModuleId}.description: Stores training module information. No authorization is required to read training module data.

/trainingModules/{trainingModuleId}/appl.description: Stores applicant information for a specific training module. Includes denormalized 'trainingModuleId' for authorization independence.
